article:
Mr. Green is our science teacher.One day he wanted to show some idea to us.He takes a large-mouth bottle and _ several large stones in it.He then asked us,"Is the bottle full now?" We all replied,"Yes!"
He then took some small rocks and put them into the _ .The small rocks went into the _ between the big rocks.He then asked. "Is it full?" This time some of us gave no answer,but most replied,"Yes!"
Mr. Green then dropped some sand into the bottle.The sand filled up the spaces between the small rocks.For the time. he asked,"Is it full?" Now most were doubting,but _ .some replied,"Yes!"
Then Mr. Green poured a cup of water into the bottle."What's the _ of this show?" He asked again.One bright student answered,"No matter how _ you are,you can always find _ to do some more things."No,"said the teacher,"the point is that if you don't place the big rocks into the bottle first,you'll _ get them in.The big rocks are the important things in your _ .If you fill your life with small things-as shown by the small rocks. the sand and the water-you'll never have the time for the important things.
